thread.title: Sympathic Hotel, with nice stuff
thread.title_full: Sympathic Hotel, with nice stuff - Review of Hotel Etats-Unis Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: safian332
title: Sympathic Hotel, with nice stuff
text: Nice big rooms, even a bathroom with window and much space for all your stuff. Breakfast was good would have loved to have more french backery stuff ;) The stuff is really nice and you can iron you stuff downstairs, the only thing.. hairdressers are really with low power, took long to dry long hair ;)
